keyMoments.description: The crew attempts their first combination technique, Pirates Docking 6: Big Emperor, though it fails when Robin refuses to participate.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's willingness to try unconventional tactics and their varying levels of dignity.

keyMoments.description: The crew executes a brilliantly coordinated series of individual attacks to topple the giant zombie Oars.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's tactical coordination and ability to work together effectively when their ridiculous plans fail.
